MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bangor, affecting properties in Love Lane, Garth Road, Holyhead Road and surrounding. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 11:33AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the  complexity of work required and our team is now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:15PM on Sunday 14th March 2021.
